timeline.message:
CodeListEntry now implements Translatable interface

Fixes: SIRI-239

timeline.author: bwiedmann
idlira
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +32,7 @@
  * @param <L> the effective entity type used to represent code lists
  * @param <E> the effective entity type used to represent code list entries
  */
-public abstract class CodeListController<I, L extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeList, E extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeListEntry<I, L>>
+public abstract class CodeListController<I, L extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeList, T extends BasicTranslations<?>, E extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeListEntry<I, L, T>>

timeline.author: idlira

timeline.bodyText:
do we really need to expose this in the type-system or can't we rely on the interface here?
-> there are tons of references to this type...
timeline.author: andyHa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -49,9 +50,10 @@
  *
  * @param <I> the type of database IDs used by the concrete implementation
  * @param <L> the effective entity type used to represent code lists
+ * @param <T> the effective entity type used to represent translations
  * @param <E> the effective entity type used to represent code list entries
  */
-public abstract class CodeLists<I, L extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeList, E extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeListEntry<I, L>> {
+public abstract class CodeLists<I, L extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeList, T extends BasicTranslations<?>, E extends BaseEntity<I> & CodeListEntry<I, L, T>> {

replies.bodyText: Also shouldn't there be a getter for translated values anywhere?
replies.author: andyHa

replies.bodyText:
true, the exposed type is not really necessary and has been removed.
added getter for translated values as well.
replies.author: cschierle

timeline.message:
Removes unnecessary Translation generic

Fixes: SIRI-239

Enables getting values with translations

Fixes: SIRI-239

Fixes issues with interfering tests

Fixes: SIRI-239
